Dot Line Suspension

The Dot Line Suspension combines the luminosity of exposed bulbs with the richness of brass in a geometrical distribution. The result is a collection of lamps inspired by a graceful balance of lines and incandescent points.

 

$1,855.00 USD

Shipping included

Clear
Purchase
Get a Quote

Details

Materials:
brass or powder coated aluminium body
brass chains and hardware (BR model) or
stainless steel chains and powder coated aluminium hardware (BK or WH models)
milk glass globes
polyester cord

Dimensions and Weight:
L 72 x W 2 x H 5 in / L 1829 x W 51 x H 127 mm
96 in / 2438 mm cord length
90 in / 2286 mm cable length
1.8 lbs / 0.8 kg

Lighting Specifications:
source : G9 LED bulbs (included)
power consumption : 5x 3.5W
colour temperature : 2700K

See product sheet for more details

Control:
refer to product sheet for recommended dimmer models

Certifications:
UL
CE
SAA

Lead Times

Standard time
7-9 weeks

Fast shipping
4 weeks – Brass only
